mTypes.name: DateTimeStamp
mTypes.output_schema:
{
                		 title:timestamp_json,
						 type:object,
						 properties: {
						  dayofweek:{type:string},
						  dayofweekName:{type:string},
						  day:{type:string},
						  month:{type:string},
						  monthName:{type:string},
						  year:{type:string},
						  hours:{type:string},
						  minutes:{type:string},
						  seconds:{type:string},
						  millis:{type:string},
						  ampm:{type:string},
						  fulldate:{type:string},
						  timezone:{type:string},
						  status:{type:string}
						                }
						        }
